EventInfo.Description: You can pay the alchemists to work overtime and expenses to rectify the situation.
The alchemists will pay for their mistake. Let the tar demon destroy the lab!
He will join your forces if you can afford his to pay his family...
A Potion of Vampiric Blood Fury
A Scroll of Summon Earth Elemental
Buy a basket of simple goodies from the old lady...
Buy a deluxe basket from the old lady...
Buy everything the old lady has and give her the rest of the day off!
